```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data <- read.csv("bank.csv",sep=";",stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
head(data)
```



```{r}
data %>%
  group_by(y) %>%
  count(marital, name = "n") %>%
  mutate(categoria = marital,
    variable = "marital",
    porcentaje = (n / sum(n)) * 100) %>%
  select(y, variable, categoria, n, porcentaje)

```
```{r}
data %>%
  group_by(y, job) %>%
  count(name = "n") %>%
  mutate(porcentaje = (n / sum(n)) * 100)
```
